401.name: UnauthorizedAPIException
401.title: Request Unauthorized
401.message: The request is not authorized or the authentication token is missing

404.name: NotFoundAPIException
404.title: Resource Not Found
404.message: The requested resource(s) could not be found

422.name: UnprocessableEntityAPIException
422.title: Unprocessable Entity
422.message: The entity in the request body does not match expected schema

500.name: InternalServerErrorAPIException
500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: A server error has been encountered

501.name: MethodNotImplementedAPIException
501.title: Method Not Implemented
501.message: The request method is not yet implemented on this resource

502.name: BadGatewayAPIException
502.title: Failed Dependency
502.message: The request could not be fulfilled due to problems with external service
